roleset.name: ambiguous

roles.note: This is often used incorrectly to mean 'equal to'. If it is used in this sense, a new frame will need to be created.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to equivocate.01. Equivocate.01 is a member of VN class linger-53.1. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Both args
example.text: Redick is equivocal about his fate.

example.name: tests can be arg 0
example.text: The FISH is equivocal so we feel oncotype dx would propbably be helpful in this situation.
